## TierPrice interface

A price based on the quantity purchased.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TierPrice 
```

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [discount?](./magento-api.tierprice.discount.md) | Maybe&lt;[ProductDiscount](./magento-api.productdiscount.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The price discount that this tier represents. |
|  [final\_price?](./magento-api.tierprice.final_price.md) | Maybe&lt;[Money](./magento-api.money.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [quantity?](./magento-api.tierprice.quantity.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The minimum number of items that must be purchased to qualify for this price tier. |
